channel.title: Mark's Prayer Site
channel.description: Recent content on Mark's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: November 18, 2025 Today's Verse 1 John 4:20–21 [20] If anyone says, “I love God,” and hates his brother, he is a liar; for he who does not love his brother whom he has seen cannot love God whom he has not seen. [21] And this commandment we have from him: whoever loves God must also love his brother. Today's Memory Verse Ephesians 6:12 - For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the cosmic powers over this present darkness, against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places.
